text: hum ne baitullah ko logo ke liye sawaab aur aman wa amaan ki jagah banaaya, tum muqaam Ibraheem ko jaaye namaaz muqarrar karlo, hum ne Ibraheem (alaihissalam) aur Ismail (alaihissalam) se waada liya ke tum mere ghar ko tawaaf karne waalo aur etekaaf karne walo aur ruko sajda karne waalo ke liye paak saaf rakho
